content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1, 1) 
- Stone furnace at position (3, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space and resources to accept the items before inserting.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing and has items available for extraction.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
